医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示基于互联网的 CBT 可以有效减少抑郁和失眠希伯来大学的一项新研究考察了基于互联网的引导认知行为疗法对抑郁症的效果，重点关注治疗联盟和依恋风格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Internet-based-CBT- effectively-reduces-depression-and-insomnia-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Internet-based-CBT-efficiently-reduces-depression-and-insomnia-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e1a41d-a88e-4717-a15e-dea50ceb0cee Mon, 20 May 2024 14:06:00 -0400 Internet-based CBT effectively reduces depression and insomnia, study shows
哥伦比亚研究人员将铁死亡与 COVID-19 肺部疾病联系起来在一些严重的 COVID-19 病例中，肺部会遭受极度损伤，导致一系列危及生命的疾病，如肺炎、炎症和急性呼吸窘迫综合征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Columbia-researchers-link-ferroptosis-to-COVID-19-lung-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Columbia-researchers-link-ferroptosis-to-COVID-19-lung-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65fb1fa4-daab-4656-8c60-a7c3070d59de Mon, 20 May 2024 14:02:16 -0400 Columbia researchers link ferroptosis to COVID-19 lung disease
使用 HyNT 印章系统进行细胞内蛋白质递送：癌症治疗的飞跃蛋白质的细胞内递送是揭示细胞功能、蛋白质复合物结构和治疗的重要技术。然而，传统的递送方法有一些局限性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Intracellular- Protein-delivery-with-HyNT-stamp-system-A-leap-forward-in-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Intracellular- Protein-delivery-with-HyNT-stamp-system-A-leap-forward-in-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bae5c1e-d8e1-40e8-8f7a-f2c6ce6e143c Mon, 20 May 2024 13:57:22 -0400 Intracellular protein delivery with HyNT stamp system: A leap forward in cancer therapy
全国民意调查显示，父母很难监控青少年的咖啡因摄入量根据一项全国民意调查，四分之一的父母表示咖啡因基本上是他们青少年日常生活的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Parents-struggle-to-monitor-teens-caffeine-intake-national-poll-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Parents-struggle-to-monitor-teens-caffeine-intake-national-poll-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806a1a2a-9d94-4c6c-89a0-1e6b49238c05 Mon, 20 May 2024 13:53:00 -0400 Parents struggle to monitor teens' caffeine intake, national poll reveals
胆囊癌的发病率总体下降，但美国黑人的发病率有所上升根据计划在 2024 年消化疾病周上发表的一项研究，过去 20 年来，大多数美国人的胆囊癌发病率一直稳定或下降，但黑人的胆囊癌发病率稳步上升，越来越多的人直到晚期才被诊断出来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Gallbladder-cancer-incidence-declines-overall-but-increases-among-Black-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Gallbladder-cancer-incidence-declines-overall-but-increases-among-Black-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c009df8-44f1-4b1f-b136-5eb79cd65137 Mon, 20 May 2024 13:46:23 -0400 Gallbladder cancer incidence declines overall but increases among Black Americans
UEA研究人员开发用于3D打印眼内装置的新型树脂东安格利亚大学的研究人员在眼科设备技术方面取得了重大突破，推出了一种用于 3D 打印眼内设备的新型树脂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/UEA-researchers-develop-novel-resin-for-3D-printing-intra eyes-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/UEA-researchers-develop-novel-resin-for-3D-printing-intra eyes-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25d0e4c5-25c7-42dc-a7e0-9fc414253203 Mon, 20 May 2024 13:34:00 -0400 UEA researchers develop novel resin for 3D printing intraocular devices
LVRNA009 mRNA 疫苗显示出针对 SARS-CoV-2 变种的长期功效宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。全球 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 大流行是由 SARS-CoV-2 引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/LVRNA009-mRNA-vaccine-shows-long-term-efficacy-against-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/LVRNA009-mRNA-vaccine-shows-long-term-efficacy-against-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4210433-e386-4e22-9ff8-62d8e2b50ef0 Mon, 20 May 2024 13:30:00 -0400 LVRNA009 mRNA vaccine shows long-term efficacy against SARS-CoV-2 variants
突破性研究显示诊断隐性呼吸道疾病的好处《新英格兰医学杂志》发表的一项全球首个临床试验显示，发现并治疗未确诊的哮喘或慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 患者可以改善他们的健康状况，并减少诊断后一年内因呼吸道症状而就诊的次数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Breakthrough-study-shows-benefits-of-diagnosing-hidden-respiratory-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Breakthrough-study-shows-benefits-of-diagnosing-hidden-respiratory-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24ffcda9-bfa0-40ba-bf02-9ce208ae2ae5 Mon, 20 May 2024 13:26:17 -0400 Breakthrough study shows benefits of diagnosing hidden respiratory diseases
医院多样性与通气患者死亡率较高有关根据 ATS 2024 International 发表的研究，因肺炎或败血症而接受机械通气的患者的死亡几率随着医院患者群体的多样性而增加，这表明缺乏资源和收入水平等更多系统性因素可能是罪魁祸首会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Hospital-diversity-linked-to-higher-mortality-rates-for-ventilated-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Hospital-diversity-linked-to-higher-mortality-rates-for-ventilated-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b9a4d3f-4770-48b9-bcef-1432ab4eb890 Mon, 20 May 2024 13:13:33 -0400 Hospital diversity linked to higher mortality rates for ventilated patients
纽瑟姆在新冠疫情期间增加了加州的公共卫生预算。现在他想把它砍掉。十月份，加利福尼亚州帕萨迪纳市的一名医生报告称，一名医院患者出现了登革热的典型症状，例如呕吐、皮疹以及骨关节疼痛，当地疾病调查人员立即采取了行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Newsom-boosted-Californiae28099s-public-health-budget-during-covid-Now-he-wants-to-cut-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Newsom-boosted-Californiae28099s-public-health-budget-during-covid-Now-he-wants-to-cut-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=312c0b0d-e7a7-4432-b5dd-634b83e450a7 Mon, 20 May 2024 10:25:12 -0400 Newsom boosted California’s public health budget during covid. Now he wants to cut it.
